mapper.update: UPDATE teacher SET teacher_num = #{teacher.account}, password = #{teacher.password}, email = #{teacher.email}, teacher_name = #{teacher.courseName}, phone = #{teacher.phone}, msg_interval = #{teacher.messageInterval}, is_activated = #{teacher.activation} WHERE id = #{teacher.teacherId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO teacher (teacher_num, password, email, teacher_name, phone, msg_interval, is_activated) VALUE (#{teacher.account}, #{teacher.password}, #{teacher.email}, #{teacher.courseName}, #{teacher.phone}, #{teacher.messageInterval}, #{teacher.activation})
mapper.select: SELECT id as teacherId, teacher_num as account, password, email, teacher_name, phone, msg_interval as messageInterval, is_activated as activation FROM teacher WHERE teacher_num = #{account}
